title: M&A Set for ‘Record-Breaking' '26: Hogan Lovells' Curtin
description: Bill Curtin, Hogan Lovells’ global head of M&A, says 2026 could be a record year for dealmaking, with a multi-year M&A run that has a higher ceiling than in past cycles. He speaks with Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
